name: BengalsFan
0:
”Alexa, open Bengals fan.”
”Alexa, ask Bengals fan for a flash briefing on the Bengals.”
”Alexa, ask Bengals fan about the previous game score.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bengals fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Bengals by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Bengals.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Bengals Fan how are the Bengals doing? 

Alexa, ask Bengals Fan who do the Bengals play next?

Alexa, ask Bengals Fan A.J. Green (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Bengals:


Alexa, ask Bengals Fan to tell me some trivia about the Bengals. 

Alexa, ask Bengals Fan how many Super Bowls have the Bengals won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
